ruleSummaries.description: The structure tree root shall contain a single Document structure element as its only child, as specified in ISO 32000-2:2020, Annex L and ISO/TS 32005

checks.errorMessage: The structure tree root contains H1,Sect element(s) instead of a single Document structure element

ruleSummaries.description: For every font embedded in a conforming file and referenced for rendering, the glyph width information in the font dictionary and in the embedded font program shall be consistent for every glyph
ruleSummaries.test: renderingMode == 3 || widthFromFontProgram == null || widthFromDictionary == null || Math.abs(widthFromFontProgram - widthFromDictionary) <= 1

checks.errorMessage: Glyph width 0 in the embedded font program is not consistent with the Widths entry of the font dictionary (value 154)
Glyph width 0 in the embedded font program is not consistent with the Widths entry of the font dictionary (value 154)

ruleSummaries.description: All structure elements shall belong to, or be role mapped to, at least one of the following namespaces specified in ISO 32000-2:2020, 14.8.6: — the PDF 1.7 namespace; — the PDF 2.0 namespace; — the MathML namespace

checks.context: root/document[0]/StructTreeRoot[0](6 0 obj PDStructTreeRoot)/K[0](42 0 obj SENonStandard Artifact)
checks.errorMessage: Non-standard structure type http://iso.org/pdf/ssn:/Artifact is not mapped to a standard type

checks.errorMessage: Non-standard structure type http://iso.org/pdf/ssn:/Artifact is not mapped to a standard type

root/document[0]/StructTreeRoot[0](6 0 obj PDStructTreeRoot)/K[1](15 0 obj SEPart Part)/K[0](16 0 obj SEHn H1)

checks.errorMessage: StructTreeRoot either doesn't contain or contains more than one <Document>

ruleSummaries.description: The PDF/UA version of a file shall be specified in the value of the Metadata entry in the document catalog using the PDF/UA identification schema

checks.errorMessage: The document metadata stream doesn't contain PDF/UA Identification Schema

ruleSummaries.description: The Font dictionary of all fonts shall define the map of all used character codes to Unicode values, either via a ToUnicode entry, or other mechanisms as defined in ISO 14289-2, 8.4.5.8

ruleSummaries.description: The font programs for all fonts used for rendering within a conforming file shall be embedded within that file, as defined in ISO 32000-2:2020, 9.9

checks.errorMessage: The font program is not embedded

validationResult.statement: PDF file is not compliant with Validation Profile requirements.
